challenges.title: Basic Cookie Decorating
challenges.description: Decorate each cookie based on its shape
challenges.exampleSolution:
For each cookie:
    If shape = "star":
        Set icing = "red"
        Set sprinkles = true
    Else if shape = "circle":
        Set icing = "green"
        Set sprinkles = false
    Else if shape = "tree":
        Set icing = "red"
        Set sprinkles = true

challenges.title: Alternating Colors
challenges.description: Create an alternating red and green pattern
challenges.exampleSolution:
For each cookie:
    If position is even:
        Set icing = "red"
    Else:
        Set icing = "green"
    Set sprinkles = false

challenges.title: Holiday Special
challenges.description: Stars get sprinkles, even positions get red icing
challenges.exampleSolution:
For each cookie:
    If shape = "star":
        Set sprinkles = true
    If position is even:
        Set icing = "red"
    Else:
        Set icing = "green"

challenges.title: Rainbow Factory
challenges.description: Use nested loops to apply colors and decorations systematically
challenges.exampleSolution:
For each color in ["red", "green", "red"]:
    For each cookie:
        Set icing = current color
        If shape = "star":
            Set sprinkles = true
        Else:
            Set sprinkles = false
